class model.phase_settings.BaseType[source]

Bases: object

Base class for all TypePhase classes.

Attributes:

imgndarray

The image data loaded from the file.

callback(action, P, text)[source]

Callback function for text input validation.

Parameters:

actionstr

The action to be performed on the text (e.g. insert, delete).

Pstr

The current value of the text.

textstr

The new text to be inserted.

Returns:

bool

True if the text is valid, False otherwise.

close_()[source]

Close the object’s frame.

name_()[source]

Get the name of the object.

Returns:

str

The name of the object.

open_file()[source]

Open a file dialog to choose a file and load its data.

open_generator()[source]

Open the hologram generator window if it doesn’t already exist.

Return type:

None

phase()[source]

Get the current phase data.

If an image has been loaded, use its data as the phase. Otherwise, create a zeros array phase.

Returns:

phase – The phase data.

Return type:

np.ndarray

Calculate the phase shift due to tilting.

Parameters:

  • ydir (str) – The tilt in the y-direction in micrometers.

down_()[source]

Decreases the value of strvar_ydir by the value of strvar_tstep.

left_()[source]

Increase the value of strvar_xdir by the value of strvar_tstep.

model.phase_settings.new_type(frm_mid, typ)[source]

Factory function for creating different types of phase.

Parameters:

frm_midnumpy.ndarray

The input numpy array.

typstr

The type of numpy array to be created. Possible values are: ‘Flat’, ‘Tilt’, ‘Binary’, ‘Background’, ‘Lens’, ‘Multi’, ‘Vortex’, ‘Zernike’, ‘Image’, ‘Hologram’.

Returns:

numpy.ndarray

The numpy array of the specified type.
